DOC.brief_title: Dose Finding Study Of CP-870,893 , An Immune System Stimulating Antibody , In Combination With Paclitaxel And Carboplatin For Patients With Metastatic Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients metastatic solid tumor , carboplatin paclitaxel appropriate ; Patients > 18 year age ; Good performance status ; Adequate bone marrow organ function Previous treatment compound target CD40 Current plan concurrent treatment anticancer agent ; Patients receive bone marrow transplant ; History autoimmune disorder History ( within previous year ) heart failure heart attack Cancerassociated coagulation disorder
